alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 1:47PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 230 PM MST... At 147 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Cotton Center, or 13 miles southwest of Goodyear, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Goodyear and Sonoran National Monument. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 238 between mile markers 8 and 14. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 132 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert
